article_title: Health Spending And First Quarter GDP

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: Obamacare is creating uncertainly and increased government control of society, which holds down economic growth. In turn, that suppresses consumption, including health care. Although the government is striving mightily to transfer consumption from other goods and services into health care, it is not enough to overwhelm the current stagnation.
og.title: Health Spending And First Quarter GDP: What The Heck Happened?
